title: Ore ga Suki nano wa Imouto dakedo Imouto ja Nai
alternative_title: 俺が好きなのは妹だけど妹じゃない
description: Suzuka Nagami is a beautiful third-year middle school student who has excellent grades and is the student council president. She wrote a novel about a little sister who dotes on her older brother, and the the novel wins a light novel award. After they discuss the matter, Yuu is the one who debuts as a proxy light novel author instead of Suzuka, under the pen name Chikai Towano.
